${ModID}:ExtractedEssenceYellowPower.NAME: Yellow Extract
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, gain #b2 additional Block from cards.

${ModID}:ExtractedEssenceRedPower.NAME: Red Extract
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, deal #b2 additional damage with attacks.

${ModID}:ExtractedEssenceWhitePower.NAME: White Extract
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, draw #b1 card when playing #yInsect #yGlaive cards.

${ModID}:MountingPower.NAME: Mount
DESCRIPTIONS: When playing Attack cards while #yAerial, gain #b1 stack. When reaching #b
stacks, lose this power and ALL enemies lose half their current #yHP.
